snippet: Gov. Jay Nixon on Thursday vetoed legislation cutting income taxes for millions of residents and thousands of business owners.
abstract: Missouri Gov Jay Nixon vetoes legislation cutting income taxes for millions of residents and thousands of business owners; says measure could jeopardize funding for schools and other services.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jay Nixon on Thursday vetoed legislation cutting income taxes for millions of residents and thousands of business owners.

headline.main: Missouri: Cuts to Income Taxes Vetoed
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Cuts to Income Taxes Vetoed
